description: Get time slot details for shop flash sale

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Example (1611555555)

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to access the API. Valid for multiple use until expiration

common_parameters.name: shop_id
common_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop api

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature generated by partner, as per auth standards.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error if any error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if any error happened

response_parameters.name: start_time
response_parameters.description: the start time of time slot

response_parameters.name: end_time
response_parameters.description: the end time of time slot

error_codes.description: You don't have permission for this operation
The information you queried is not found
Something is wrong. Please try later

notes: The documentation shows both Chinese and Global URLs for the API endpoint. The API appears to be part of Shopee's flash sale management system.
